WRITING.TEXT: That's a good question! I guess it's the sound.. but yeah. Now I will always think about that when a see a water beam :-D
He has balls... *had .. that's all I know
Ohhhh.. That was a better joke!!

WRITING.TITLE: When you're man enough to deliver the job application yourself

WRITING.TEXT: Never let go.. Take it as a experience. It's a good story for the grandkids
